metadata.name: IUE CourseCompass Evaluation Test Set
metadata.description: Sample questions for testing the RAG evaluation harness

questions.question: What is the prerequisite for CE 216 Fundamental Topics in Programming?
questions.expected_answer: SE 116 with a grade of at least FD

questions.question: What are the first semester courses for Software Engineering?
questions.expected_answer: The first semester courses include CHEM 101, ENG 101, MATH 151, PHYS 101, SE 100, and SFL 101

questions.question: How many ECTS credits is SE 420 Software Quality and Testing?
What are the learning outcomes of SE 302 Principles of Software Engineering?
questions.expected_answer: Students will learn software development methodologies, requirements analysis, design principles, and project management

questions.question: Compare the database courses between Software Engineering and Computer Engineering
questions.expected_answer: Both departments offer CE 223 Database Systems as a core course

questions.question: How many mandatory courses are in semester 3 for Computer Engineering?
What quantum computing courses does IUE Software Engineering offer?
questions.expected_answer: IUE does not offer dedicated quantum computing courses in the Software Engineering curriculum

questions.question: What machine learning courses are available?
questions.expected_answer: SE 468 Machine Learning is available as a technical elective

questions.question: What programming languages are taught in CE 221?
questions.expected_answer: CE 221 Data Structures and Algorithms focuses on algorithm implementation concepts

questions.question: What blockchain courses are mandatory for Software Engineering?
questions.expected_answer: There are no mandatory blockchain courses in the Software Engineering curriculum

questions.question: What is the weekly schedule for EEE 242 Digital Design?
questions.expected_answer: EEE 242 covers digital logic, combinational and sequential circuits

questions.question: Which department has more programming courses in their curriculum?
questions.expected_answer: Software Engineering and Computer Engineering both have extensive programming courses

questions.question: What internship requirements exist for Industrial Engineering?
questions.expected_answer: IE 290 and IE 390 are summer practice courses

questions.question: How many elective courses must SE students take?
questions.expected_answer: SE students must take multiple technical electives and departmental electives

questions.question: What are the objectives of MATH 151 Calculus I?
questions.expected_answer: MATH 151 covers limits, derivatives, and integrals
